attributes.action: England fans to be refunded by the players for the Iceland match.
attributes.additional_details:
Iceland have a population the size of Leicester. 
They have more active volcanos than football pitches. 
They don't have a professional league. 
England players earn what most fans earn in a lifetime in 6 months. They were happy just to let Roy take the backlash.
attributes.background: I feel that every England fan who went to the Iceland v Emgland game should be refunded there ticket prices by the players that played apart from Marcus Rashford as he was the only one who did the shirt proud. There is no excuse for not even putting in a performance never mind a win.
